entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning late this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
